name: SpaceBox (doozer)
description:
This game was created for the Ludum Dare 42 game jam in 72 hours. The theme for this jam was "running out of space".

You are in charge of organizing the cargo on a trading ship. Your goal is to try to keep as much cargo as possible safe on your trip across the solar system.

Move using the WASD or arrow keys. Pick up and place down boxes using the space bar. Boxes fall from above. Try not to get hit by them, and try not to let other boxes get crushed!

This was my first attempt to create a game using the open source Godot Engine.
